database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Molecular Architecture of the Yeast Mediator Complex
entry.description: Cross-linking MS data from the yeast Mediator complex. Cross-linking was performed using either BS3 or 1:1 mix of d0:d12 DSS. Includes unfractionated, SEC enriched, high pH reverse phase fractionated, DDA and inclusion list generated files.

additional_fields.field: Monolink of DSS/BS3 crosslinker to Lys or N-terminus.
cross-linking, mass spectrometry, mediator complex, transcription, structural biology
